title: How to Tell Stories to Children, and Some Stories to Tell
creator: Sara Cone Bryant
description: LibriVox recording of How to Tell Stories to Children, and Some Stories to Tell, by Sara Cone Bryant. Sara Cone Bryant was an educator and storyteller who wrote several books on the importance of oral storytelling to children, and stories to tell children. This volume expounds on her theories and practices of telling stories to children, and provides several examples. Her conversational writing style makes this work as relevant for parents and teachers as it was 90 years ago. (Summary by Sean McGaughey) For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. M4B format available
subject: librivox; audiobook; children; storytelling; education
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
